short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used for Mediamint Adops agents for the process of adding checklist items to the ticket.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Calculates the timespent on a ticket.

MM - NXTR - QACL WorkLog is an internal extension that lets you.
1. Work on zendesk tickets with simple Start and Stop button.
2. Calculates the timespent on tickets in zendesk.
3. Removes manual entries in timetracker.

Increase Productivity, save time.
